name: Glaceon

ability.name: Crystal Genome
ability.effect: Attacks from Pokemon that evolve from Eevee are not affected by Weakness, Resistance, or other abilities on your opponent's Pokemon.

attacks.name: Chilling Out
attacks.effect: Shuffle 3 cards from your hand into your deck, or this attack does nothing.

flavor: A scientist wanted her Eevee to live forever and cryogenically froze it. Eevee reacted to this experiment in a very unexpected way.
